name: COMP-PRO Library
postCreateCommand: mkdir -p ~/.local/bin && curl -fsSL https://starship.rs/install.sh | sh -s -- -y -b ~/.local/bin && grep -q 'starship init bash' ~/.bashrc || echo 'eval "$(~/.local/bin/starship init bash)"' >> ~/.bashrc && grep -q 'export PATH="$HOME/.local/bin:$PATH"' ~/.bashrc || echo 'export PATH="$HOME/.local/bin:$PATH"' >> ~/.bashrc
